Fields in mcm.graphics declared as Trace
protected  Trace Body.tracer
          May be used for tracing purposes.
 

Methods in mcm.graphics that return Trace

Uses of Trace in mcm.theater

protected  Trace Stage.tracer

Methods in mcm.theater that return Trace

Methods in mcm.theater with parameters of type Trace

Uses of Trace in mcm.utils
 

Fields in mcm.utils declared as Trace
static Trace Trace.global
          Globally available Trace instance that is initialized to use System.err as its output stream.
 

Methods in mcm.utils with parameters of type Trace
